questionTitle: ___ in 1635, the Boston Latin School is the oldest public school in the United States.
At an experimental agricultural station, many types of grass are grown ________ various conditions.
________ did Arthur realize that there was danger.
anwers: After he had entered the store

questionTitle: As soon as ________ with an acid, salt, and sometimes water, is formed.
Helen Keller lost both her sight and hearing after a severe illness ________.
Some plants are annuals; ________ are biennials; the rest are perennials.
________ up to seven months.
anwers: Because a New England winter can last
The length of a New England winter

questionTitle: Children just love computer games, ________ many adults.
________, common weedy plants with many-rayed yellow flowers, are more popular among children than among adults.
Robots are being used increasingly in industry as they can work on large jobs faster, are more precise and ________.
Touch-typing was originally devised as an aid to ________.
________ he was writing his plays and poems four centuries ago, Shakespeare's ideas are still relevant today.
The role of the mass media in influencing public policy decisions, maintaining or changing the status quo of our society, and ________ outlets for all types of views is enormous.
Although it is difficult ________ , a frog is more likely to be smooth and wet, and a toad rough and dry.
anwers: distinguishing among a frog and a toad
distinguish a frog and a toad
between a frog and a toad distinguish
to distinguish between a frog and a toad

questionTitle: ________ extensively by persons who cannot speak or hear, American Sign Language ranks as the fourth most widely used language in the U.S. today.
Cupid, one of the ancient Roman gods, ________.
anwers: representing as a little winged child
was represented as a little winged child

questionTitle: The electric eel uses its electric shock to capture food and ________.
